00019 #ifndef _IPL98_ARRAYOS2DCONSTIT_H
00020 #define _IPL98_ARRAYOS2DCONSTIT_H
00021 
00022 #include<iostream>
00023 #include<valarray>
00024 #include<algorithm>
00025 #include "array2d_const_it.h"
00026 
00027 namespace ipl{ // use namespace if C++
00028 
00043 template<class T>
00044 class CArrayOS2DConstIterator : public CArray2DConstIterator<T>
00045 {
00046 private: // attributes
00050         unsigned int m_SubIndexing;
00054         const CPoint2D<double>* m_Origo;
00055 public:
00057         CArrayOS2DConstIterator(valarray<T>* vv, slice ss, unsigned int SubIndexing, const CPoint2D<double>* Origo) : 
00058                                                                         CArray2DConstIterator<T>(vv,ss), m_SubIndexing(SubIndexing), m_Origo(Origo){}
00060         inline CArrayOS2DConstIterator& operator=(const CArrayOS2DConstIterator& It);
00063         inline CArrayOS2DConstIterator End() const;
00065         inline CArrayOS2DConstIterator& operator++() { m_Curr++; return *this; }
00067         CArrayOS2DConstIterator operator++(int) { CArrayOS2DConstIterator t = *this; m_Curr++; return t; }
00069         inline const T& operator[](double i) const { return (*m_pData)[m_s.start()+(i+m_Origo->GetY())*m_SubIndexing*m_s.stride()]; }
00070 };
00071 
00072 template<class T>
00073 inline CArrayOS2DConstIterator<T>& CArrayOS2DConstIterator<T>::operator=(const CArrayOS2DConstIterator<T>& It)
00074 {
00075         CArray2DConstIterator<T>::operator=(It);
00076         m_SubIndexing=It.m_SubIndexing;
00077         m_Origo=It.m_Origo;
00078         return *this;
00079 }
00080 
00081 template<class T>
00082 inline CArrayOS2DConstIterator<T> CArrayOS2DConstIterator<T>::End() const
00083 {
00084         CArrayOS2DConstIterator<T> t = *this;
00085         t.m_Curr = m_s.size();
00086         return t;
00087 }
00088 
00089 } // end namespace ipl
00090 
00091 #endif //_IPL98_ARRAYOS2DCONSTIT_H
